Nodes.name: Villager:
Nodes.text: Oh, hello. Are you here to see my fantastic collection?

Nodes.name: Villager:
Nodes.text: See how beautiful this one is? It's minted in a far away land.

Nodes.name: Villager:
Nodes.text: And this one here, made from a rare alloy only found deep in the mountains north of here.

Nodes.name: Villager:
Nodes.text: Oh goodness, look at how long I kept you, I'm sorry. Thank you for listening!
